com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.util

类 Entities

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chinamobile.android.connectionmanager.util.Entities

  • public class Entities
extends java.lang.Object
    This class supplies some methods to escape / unescape special chars according XML specifications

    • 字段概要

      The set of entities supported by standard XML.
